column1: Smoque BBQ////If you get the full brisket sandwich
column2: you can get a combo of chopped and sliced. I am sure sliced is wonderful
column3: but I have yet to try it. The meat has such a good BBQ bark that is fantastic. The mac and cheese is individually baked so you get a wonderful crust on top. However
column4: eat this while hot. The deliciousness is directly correlated with the hotness factor. The slaw is great too - mixed with a vinaigrette rather than mayo. Nice tough Smoque. Â
